headline: PNC to buy Colorado bank for $4.1 billion as part of coast-to-coast push
summary: Pittsburgh’s PNC Financial Services Group said Monday it reached an agreement to acquire Colorado lender FirstBank for $4.1 billion, moving one of the largest regional banks in the US one step closer to becoming a coast-to-coast brand.

raw.headline: PNC to buy Colorado bank for $4.1 billion as part of coast-to-coast push
raw.summary: Pittsburgh’s PNC Financial Services Group said Monday it reached an agreement to acquire Colorado lender FirstBank for $4.1 billion, moving one of the largest regional banks in the US one step closer to becoming a coast-to-coast brand.

headline: Bank of America reports small business hiring down 6.7% year-over-year amid tariff surge
summary: Bank of America Institute data shows small business hiring slowed 6.7% year-over-year as of July as tariff payments by importing firms surged nearly 170% since early this year.

raw.headline: Bank of America reports small business hiring down 6.7% year-over-year amid tariff surge
raw.summary: Bank of America Institute data shows small business hiring slowed 6.7% year-over-year as of July as tariff payments by importing firms surged nearly 170% since early this year.

headline: Klarna IPO Update: Don't Buy Now Or Later
summary: Klarna's IPO is unattractive; its $13-14B valuation is far too expensive. Despite revenue growth, Klarna remains unprofitable and faces intense competition.

raw.headline: Klarna IPO Update: Don't Buy Now Or Later
